hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides #Talon's House#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Compass#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Game Key# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #4# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #5# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Impa's House#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Compass#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Song of Storms#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Heart Container# can be found in #Goron City#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Green Rupee# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
